name: cycletls
description: Spoof TLS/JA3 fingerprint in JS with help from Go
author: Danny-Dasilva

scripts.build:go:linux:amd64: cross-env GO111MODULE=off GOOS=linux    GOARCH=amd64  go build -o ./dist/index        ./src && chmod +x ./dist/index
scripts.build:go:linux:arm: cross-env GO111MODULE=off GOOS=linux    GOARCH=arm    go build -o ./dist/index-arm    ./src && chmod +x ./dist/index-arm
scripts.build:go:linux:arm64: cross-env GO111MODULE=off GOOS=linux    GOARCH=arm64  go build -o ./dist/index-arm64  ./src && chmod +x ./dist/index-arm64
scripts.build:go:mac:amd64: cross-env GO111MODULE=off GOOS=darwin   GOARCH=amd64  go build -o ./dist/index-mac    ./src && chmod +x ./dist/index-mac
scripts.build:go:windows:amd64: cross-env GO111MODULE=off GOOS=windows  GOARCH=amd64  go build -o ./dist/index.exe    ./src
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build:go
